message.body: Hey all, I'm home sick again today. Im just not getting better
Julia, I told you I would treat you tonight and I still will, I can call in card no. To pay for u!
If anyone has time to lunge him I'd be very grateful!!! Pass it on....
So I guess you guys don't like the piper! Lol!!
I just think it's funny that as soon as I said I wasn't going first thing dev says is are we still goin there? Lol! It was just funny to me! Hahaha!
Ok, now they are changing everything around since I'm not going. Not sure what you're going to do but why don't we (u and I) just reschedule our piper date? How's about fri lunch?
Hahaha I just picked up my phone and I have a billion texts! Friday's good, I just have to be done by 2ish, say noon? I hope you feel better!
I have to work til noon so I won't get there until like 12:40
Ok! I can meet you then
